repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: List of repositories to sync. If empty, all repositories will be fetched.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: The number of days to look back for data

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The start date to look back for data

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The end date to look back for data

api_timeout.title: API Request Timeout
api_timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for each request to the Codacy API. 0 means no timeout

api_max_retries.title: Max Number of Retries
api_max_retries.description: The max number of retries before giving up on retrying requests to the Codacy API
